name: freee-app-template-firebase
description: Sample application for freee app on firebase

scripts.start: concurrently -kill-others-on-fail "cd hosting; npm run watch" "cd functions; npm run watch" "cd hosting; npm run start"
scripts.deploy: cd hosting; npm run build; cd ../functions; npm run build; firebase deploy
scripts.setup: npm install; cd hosting; npm install; cd ../functions; npm install;
scripts.project-fmt: npm run function-fmt && npm run hosting-fmt
